TopicTitle: TinTin Moon Rocket From TinTin comic series "Destination Moon"

Articles.Content:
I like TinTin comics series,since these comics are amusing.

I just found a the rocket that TinTin and his friends rode when they are going to Moon.It works same as the one that  "Destination Moon" plotted-Single Stage To Orbit.

Here's the link

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/230384-moon-rocket-from-tintin
I read that book about ten years ago
